summary: A command‑line utility that transforms a pretrained HuggingFace BERT checkpoint into a NeMo Megatron‑BERT checkpoint, handling configuration adjustments, optional model‑parallel setup, and precision selection before saving the resulting .nemo file.
business_intent: Allow developers to migrate existing HuggingFace BERT models into the NVIDIA NeMo ecosystem for accelerated training and inference with Megatron‑LM features.
